name: shAI-V
description:
shAI-V puts you in the shoes of a college programmer, who had just been accepted into an internship with a military tech corporation by the name of CyberCode. You quickly realize that working here means putting your life on the line...

This is a visual novel developed in July 2018 as a final project for BINUS University International's Games Design and Programming course. The length of the game is around 30 minutes.

Developed and written by Runa Yauw and Dezza Rizqi.
